titles.title: To provide for a land exchange between the Ironton Country Club of Ironton, Ohio, and the Secretary of Agriculture involving Wayne National Forest.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Resource Conservation, Research and Forestry.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/12/1995--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to convey to a named country club in Ohio all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to two specified parcels of real property comprising a portion of Wayne National Forest.
